meanings.definition: Relating to the mouth and throat.
meanings.sent1: The dentist examined my oropharyngeal health during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed medication for my oropharyngeal infection.
meanings.sent3: I told a joke that made my oropharyngeal area laugh!
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was like an oropharyngeal symphony.
meanings.sent5: The spicy soup burned my oropharyngeal region like a fiery dragon.

meanings.definition: Located in the region of the mouth and pharynx.
meanings.sent1: The oropharyngeal tonsils help protect against infections.
meanings.sent2: The oropharyngeal muscles are essential for swallowing food.
meanings.sent3: The oropharyngeal party was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent4: His words were an oropharyngeal maze, difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The oropharyngeal sensation of the cold ice cream was delightful.
